DOC.brief_summary: Project Prepared theoretically base , comprehensive , intensive group intervention design prepare early adolescent middle adolescence challenge . It emphasize skill avoid risky sexual situation , provide medically accurate information sexual development , sexually transmitted infection pregnancy . Effectiveness measure use randomize control trial design track difference cognitive factor ( HIV/STI ( Sexually Transmitted Infections ) knowledge , sexual self-efficacy ; intention use condom ) ; relationship factor ( immature romantic belief , relationship self-efficacy ) , gender norm ( macho man , powerless female ) , resilience .
DOC.criteria: 1214 yr old live Bronx , NY Baseline Has see point one Montefiore Medical Center community health clinic . Inability independently complete questionnaire/training due sensory , cognitive motor disability . Reading ability NOT 5th grade reading subtest Widerange Achievement Test .
